verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David; for a memorial.) O God,<WH430> [hasten<WH2363>] to deliver<WH5337> me; O Lord,<WH3068> hasten to my help!<WH5833>
Let those be ashamed<WH954> and humiliated<WH2659> Who seek<WH1245> my life;<WH5315> Let those be turned<WH5472> back<WH268> and dishonored<WH3637> Who delight<WH2655> in my hurt.<WH9567>
Let those be turned<WH7725> back<WH7725> because<WH5921> <WH6118> of their shame<WH1322> Who say,<WH559> "Aha,<WH1889> aha!<WH1889>"

Let all<WH3605> who seek<WH1245> Thee rejoice<WH7797> and be glad<WH8055> in Thee; And let those who love<WH157> Thy salvation<WH3444> say<WH559> continually,<WH8548> "Let God<WH430> be magnified.<WH1431>"
But I am afflicted<WH6041> and needy;<WH34> Hasten<WH2363> to me, O God!<WH430> Thou art my help<WH5828> and my deliverer;<WH6403> O Lord,<WH3068> do not delay.<WH309>
